item.title: The Clovers - Love Potion No. 9 - Key of Am
item.description:
For Educational Use. Key of Am: Am, Dm, C, E7, B7. As performed by the Clovers.
Credit to Mookie's Ukulele Play Along: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qgxnc2TyDvs
The ukulele font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com
